overview_of_class: This course covers anatomical and physiological mechanisms of breathing, phonation and articulation. Laboratories include dissection and participation in physiological research. The course is conducted completely online. It will be asynchronous; students can participate in discussions and complete assignments by working at their own pace, as long as deadlines are met.
name: Anatomy and Physiology of the Vocal Mechanism
title: SCS CSD 301-DL-12 Anatomy and Physiology of the Vocal Mechanism

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers anatomical and physiological mechanisms of breathing, phonation and articulation. Laboratories include dissection and participation in physiological research. The course is conducted completely online. It will be asynchronous; students can participate in discussions and complete assignments by working at their own pace, as long as deadlines are met.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: This course is restricted to students in the Prespeech Pathology program. Other SPS students may register using a permission number, if room is available. Contact spsundergraduate@northwestern.edu for more information.

subject: CSD
